QUES 1
import numpy as np
a=np.random.random(10).reshape(10,1)
print(a)
print("mean of 10 elements is:")
np.mean(a)

OUTPUT

[[0.67918052]
 [0.23486089]
 [0.90853478]
 [0.96266821]
 [0.31857068]
 [0.02395491]
 [0.7568246 ]

 [0.00505533]
 [0.2167324 ]]

0.46648116951999674

QUES 2
import numpy as np
a=np.random.random(20).reshape(20,1)
print(a)
print("standard division is:",np.std(a))
print("variance is :",np.var(a))

OUTPUT
[[0.00884481]
 [0.42681619]

QUES 3
import numpy as np
a=np.random.rand(10,20)
print("array a:",a)
b=np.random.rand(20,25)
print("array b:",b)
print("matrix multiplication is:")
d=np.dot(a,b).reshape(10,25)
print(d)
print("sum is:")
print(np.sum(d))

OUTPUT

QUES 4
import numpy as np
import math
a=np.random.rand(10,1)
print(a)
def sigmoid(x):
    return 1 / (1 + np.exp(-x)) 
sigmoid_v = np.vectorize(sigmoid)
print("after function is applied:")
print(sigmoid_v(a))

OUTPUT
[[0.76135642]
 [0.08012986]
 [0.44472505]
 [0.56719351]
 [0.8680261 ]
 [0.64543685]
 [0.49362876]
 [0.22491592]
 [0.52564987]
 [0.13941956]]
after function is applied:
[[0.68164816]
 [0.52002175]
 [0.60938434]
 [0.63811534]
 [0.70433481]
 [0.65598143]
 [0.6209609 ]
 [0.55599313]
 [0.62846794]
 [0.53479854]]
